title: Gemma Atkinson shows off incredible body transformation three months after birth of baby Mia
text:

Gemma Atkinson gave birth to her daughter Mia just three months ago, and has now revealed how she completely transformed her body.

The soap star, 34, took to Instagram to show how far her body has come since Mia arrived, starting with when she was five months pregnant, through to six weeks postpartum and finally to today.

In the first snap Gemma was glowing as she sported her baby bump, and in the second snap she smiled proudly at her post baby belly.

Finally, in the third image she sports a completely flat stomach as she holds little Mia on her hip.

Gemma captioned the photo: "Dear body, Thank you! 5 months pregnant / 6wks PP / 15 wks PP. All different but all for a purpose. Growing my baby, feeding my baby, becoming strong and healthy again to be there for my baby.

"My training has even more purpose now I have Mia. I’m her role model!

"My health & mentally feeling good was always my priority with exercise. It was never to compete on stage or to chase a certain physique. It was just to be the best version of ME!

(Image: David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock)

"By making good nutritious choices with my meals without depriving myself (hello once a week cheesecake & pizza) I’m slowly getting back into it.

"I’m still limited to what I can do exercise wise after an emergency C section but doing something is better than doing nothing.

"I started with just cardio around 8wks PP and last week I had my first session back in the gym. It was tough and I had to go back to basics but afterwards I felt Amazing! It’s always worth it once those endorphins kick in.

(Image: Instagram)

"As the saying goes, 'No one regrets a workout once it’s done'.

"Despite being physically weaker in the gym after time away, I feel mentally stronger than I ever have going through what I did to bring Mia into this world.

"When things get tough, I remind myself that I’m a Mum. A badass Mum. A privilege sadly denied to many... I’m so lucky, thats what keeps me going."

(Image: Instagram)

Gemma, who is in a relationship with Strictly Come Dancing's Gorka Marquez, had a difficult birthing experience.

She had to be induced and Mia's heart rate dropped after every contraction.

As a result, Gemma had to have an emergency caesarian, but a few hours later she suffered from a hemorrage.
